On 2/23/07, Andrzej Jan Taramina <andrzej@...> wrote:
>  Anybody know of any similar beasties that do orchestration in the REST world?
>  That is, BPEL engines that can do resource manipulation/orchestration across
>  the usual HTTP verbs?

Do you mean BPEL literally, or any way to do orchestration or
choreography RESTfully?

The w3c Choreography group, which I was part of for awhile, started
out using pi-calculus as its basis, which I think has some similarity
to REST.  But of course they did not end up there...
